commit.message:
Rollup merge of #94754 - c410-f3r:nice-error, r=lcnr

Warn users about `||` in let chain expressions

Or more specifically, warn that `||` operators are forbidden.

This PR is simple so I guess anyone can review 🤷

cc #53667
cc ``@matthewjasper``

Rollup merge of #94754 - c410-f3r:nice-error, r=lcnr

Warn users about `||` in let chain expressions

Or more specifically, warn that `||` operators are forbidden.

This PR is simple so I guess anyone can review 🤷
